aspect: 1. Young accountant, Jacob Phillips, died after falling 70ft down a cliff when running from a taxi to avoid paying the fare.
2. Phillips and his friends got into the taxi without enough money, later attempting to avoid paying by using an ATM.
3. The driver initially thought they would stop at an ATM, but Phillips ran off; he was found dead the next day.
explain: Young accountant Jacob Phillips died after falling 70ft down a cliff in an attempt to avoid paying a fare when running from a taxi at night in December.
Jacob Phillips and his friends needed money for the taxi, so they planned to use an ATM to avoid paying.

After Jacob Phillips missed the chance to get enough cash at a previous stop, the driver assumed they would use an ATM and continued the journey. However, Jacob ran away, and the following day, he was found dead at the base of the cliff.
